name: com.wikitude.phonegap.wikitudeplugin
description:
Augmented Reality Wikitude SDK Plugin 
        The Wikitude Cordova Plugin enables developers to embed an augmented reality view into their PhoneGap project. You can create a fully featured app with advanced augmented reality features, including image recognition, purely using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
